org.gradle.nativeplatform.platform

Interface OperatingSystem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named

    @Incubating
public interface OperatingSystem
extends Named
    A machine operating system.
    Operating System Aliases
    Windows "windows"
    GNU/Linux "linux"
    MacOS "osx", "mac os x", "darwin"
    Solaris "solaris", "sunos"
